SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT substr(AA.START_TIME,1,10) JOB_START_TIME, sum(AA.COMPLETED) COMPLETED, sum(AA.FAILED) FAILED, sum(AA.REHNDN) REHNDN FROM ( SELECT a.job_instance_id, A.START_TIME AS START_TIME, 0 AS COMPLETED, 0 AS FAILED, (case when a.job_execution_id is not null then 1 else 0 end) as REHNDN from batch_job_execution a where a.exit_code = 'FAILED' and a.job_execution_id in (select b.job_execution_id from batch_job_execution b where b.JOB_INSTANCE_ID = a.JOB_INSTANCE_ID AND b.job_execution_id = (select max(JOB_EXECUTION_ID) from batch_job_execution where JOB_INSTANCE_ID = b.JOB_INSTANCE_ID) and b.exit_code <> 'COMPLETED') UNION ALL SELECT a.job_instance_id, A.START_TIME AS START_TIME, (case when a.EXIT_CODE = 'COMPLETED' then 1 else 0 end) as COMPLETED, 0 as FAILED, 0 AS REHNDN FROM BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION A WHERE A.EXIT_CODE = 'COMPLETED' UNION ALL SELECT a.job_instance_id, A.START_TIME AS START_TIME, 0 as COMPLETED, (case when a.EXIT_CODE = 'FAILED' then 1 else 0 end) as FAILED, 0 AS REHNDN FROM BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION A WHERE A.EXIT_CODE = 'FAILED' ) AA, batch_job_instance BB left join tn_batch CC on bb.job_name = cc.batch_id left join tn_job_dlbrt DD on CC.JOB_DLBRT_NO = DD.JOB_DLBRT_NO where aa.job_instance_id = bb.job_instance_id
DD.JOB_SE_CODE
#inWhe[]#
GROUP BY AA.START_TIME order by aa.start_time desc ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM (
select (select code_nm from tc_cmmndetailcode where code_id='BO001' and code = AA.job_se_code) as job_se_code, sum(AA.job_cn_cnt) job_cn_cnt, sum(AA.bat_cn_cnt) bat_cn_cnt, sum(AA.bat_wdtb_cnt) bat_wdtb_cnt, sum(AA.bat_reg_cnt) bat_reg_cnt from ( select a.job_se_code, sum(case when b.job_dlbrt_result_code = 'CN' then 1 else 0 end) as job_cn_cnt, 0 as bat_cn_cnt, 0 as bat_wdtb_cnt, 0 as bat_reg_cnt from tn_job_dlbrt a , tn_job_dlbrt_result b where a.JOB_DLBRT_NO = b.JOB_DLBRT_NO group by a.job_se_code union all select a.job_se_code, 0 as job_cn_cnt, sum(case when d.batch_dlbrt_result_code = 'CN' then 1 else 0 end) as bat_cn_cnt, sum(case when (d.batch_dlbrt_result_code = 'CN' and c.wdtb_at = 'N') then 1 else 0 end) as bat_wdtb_cnt, 0 as bat_reg_cnt from tn_job_dlbrt a , tn_batch_dlbrt c , tn_batch_dlbrt_result d where a.job_dlbrt_no = c.JOB_DLBRT_NO and a.JOB_DLBRT_NO = d.JOB_DLBRT_NO and c.batch_DLBRT_NO = d.BATCH_DLBRT_NO
a.JOB_SE_CODE
#inWhe[]#
group by a.job_se_code union all select a.job_se_code, 0 as job_cn_cnt, 0 as bat_cn_cnt, 0 as bat_wdtb_cnt, count(a.batch_id) as bat_reg_cnt from tn_batch a where a.delete_at = 'N'
a.JOB_SE_CODE
#inWhe[]#
group by a.job_se_code
) AA group by AA.job_se_code order by AA.JOB_SE_CODE
) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM (
select (select code_nm from tc_cmmndetailcode where code_id='BO001' and code = c.job_se_code) as job_se_code, a.batch_nm, concat(b.execut_schdul_hour, concat(':', (concat(b.execut_schdul_mnt, (concat(':', b.execut_schdul_secnd)))))) as bat_execut_time from tn_batch a, tn_schdul b, tn_job_dlbrt c where a.batch_id = b.BATCH_ID and a.JOB_DLBRT_NO = c.JOB_DLBRT_NO AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' and ( B.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'A' OR ( B.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'B' AND SUBSTR(B.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'dd') - TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'd') + 1, 1) = '1' ) OR ( B.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'C' AND SUBSTR(B.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, 7, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') ) OR ( B.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'D' AND SUBSTR(B.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE, 5, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MMDD') ) OR ( B.EXECUT_CYCLE = 'E' AND B.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) )
c.JOB_SE_CODE
#inWhe[]#
) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
